psps.name: 2Checkout (Verifone)
psps.summary: 2Checkout, now part of Verifone, offers a payment platform for online businesses to accept payments. It supports multiple payment methods and currencies, with features like subscription billing, fraud detection, invoicing, and integration with e-commerce platforms.

psps.name: 2C2P
psps.summary: 2C2P is a payment service provider in Southeast Asia, offering payment solutions for online, mobile, and in-store transactions. The platform supports multiple payment methods, including credit cards, digital wallets, and alternative payment channels, providing businesses with  tools for payments across the region.

psps.name: Adyen
psps.summary: Adyen is a payment company offering businesses an end-to-end infrastructure for managing online, mobile, and in-store payments. Adyen provides solutions for risk management, analytics, and acquiring services, catering to enterprises with significant transaction volumes.

psps.name: Airwallex
psps.summary: Airwallex is a payment platform offering a various financial services, including cross-border payments, multi-currency accounts, and virtual cards. It focuses on providing financial solutions for businesses looking to expand their operations with transparent payment options.

psps.name: Amazon Payment Services (PayFort)
psps.summary: Amazon Payment Services, formerly PayFort, provides secure and reliable online payment solutions for businesses across the Middle East and North Africa. It supports various payment methods, offers advanced fraud protection, and ensures seamless integration for e-commerce platforms.

psps.name: Authorize.net
psps.summary: Authorize.net is a payment gateway service provider that enables merchants to accept credit card and electronic check payments. It offers fraud detection, recurring billing, and customer information management tools to businesses of all sizes.

psps.name: Bambora
psps.summary: Bambora, now part of Worldline, provides a various payment services for businesses, from e-commerce and mobile payments to in-store transactions. The company focuses on simplifying the payment process for small and medium-sized enterprises.

psps.name: BlueSnap
psps.summary: BlueSnap is a payments provider that helps businesses accept payments online, on mobile, and via marketplaces. It offers built-in fraud prevention, supports over 100 payment methods, and helps businesses streamline payment processing with support for multiple currencies.

psps.name: Chase Payment Solutions
psps.summary: Chase Payment Solutions offers payment processing solutions, including online, in-store, and mobile transactions. It provides businesses with payment processing, fraud prevention, and analytics, catering to a various industries and sizes.

psps.name: Checkout.com
psps.summary: Checkout.com is a payment solutions provider offering payment processing, including accepting online payments and fraud detection. It supports multiple currencies and payment methods, aiming to improve transaction speed and customer conversion for businesses worldwide.

psps.name: Cielo
psps.summary: Cielo is one of Brazil's largest payment processors, providing solutions for both online and offline transactions. It supports credit and debit card payments, including installment options, making it a choice for e-commerce in Brazil.

psps.name: CX Pay
psps.summary: CX Pay is a payment gateway specializing in solutions for the Dutch Caribbean, Latin America, and merchants. It supports a various payment methods, including Visa, Mastercard, iDeal, Giropay, and alternative payments like Paysafecard and Bitcoin. CX Pay offers a multi-channel integration, fraud protection, and tools for cross-border transactions, making it an partner for eCommerce businesses looking to expand.

psps.name: Cybersource
psps.summary: Cybersource, a Visa company, provides a payment management platform that includes payment processing, fraud management, and security solutions. It helps businesses optimize their payment operations, offering reliability and scalability for enterprises handling complex transactions.

psps.name: DG Financial Technology
psps.summary: DGFT (formerly VeriTrans), a service by Digital Garage in Japan, provides payment processing solutions. It offers services for online payments, including credit card and mobile payments, catering to a various businesses with fraud prevention and integration options.

psps.name: dLocal
psps.summary: dLocal is a payment platform focused on emerging markets, enabling global businesses to accept payments, send payouts, and settle funds locally. It supports multiple payment methods, including cards, bank transfers, and digital wallets, across Latin America, Africa, and Asia.

psps.name: EBANX
psps.summary: EBANX is a payment gateway tailored for the Latin American market, supporting local payment methods in Brazil, Mexico, Argentina, and more. It enables international businesses to reach LATAM consumers with local payment solutions.

psps.name: Elavon
psps.summary: Elavon is a provider of payment processing solutions, serving businesses across industries with , , and payment technologies. It supports a variety of payment methods and provides integrations for both in-store and online transactions.

psps.name: Eway
psps.summary: Eway is a widely-used payment gateway in Australia and beyond, known for offering payment processing. It supports all major credit cards, is PCI-DSS compliant, and integrates with various e-commerce platforms. eWay also provides 24/7 technical support and flat-rate transaction fees, making it for small to medium businesses.

psps.name: Eximbay
psps.summary: Eximbay is a payment gateway specializing in cross-border e-commerce, offering payment solutions and supporting a variety of international payment methods. It caters to businesses seeking and localized payment processing for markets.

psps.name: Fat Zebra
psps.summary: Fat Zebra is an Australian-based payment gateway that specializes in providing payment solutions for businesses. It focuses on delivering a  platform for e-commerce, supporting multiple payment methods and currencies to streamline transactions.

psps.name: Fiuu
psps.summary: Fiuu, formerly known as Razer Merchant Services, is a payment service provider offering businesses in Southeast Asia and beyond a  platform for online, mobile, and in-store payments. With a focus on scalability, Fiuu supports various payment methods and currencies for   transactions.

psps.name: Fiserv
psps.summary: Fiserv, formerly First Data, is a provider of financial services technology, including payment processing for businesses of all sizes. Its platform supports a variety of payment methods and offers solutions for both online and in-store payments.

psps.name: Global Payments
psps.summary: Global Payments is a provider of payment technology services, offering solutions for in-store, online, and mobile transactions. It serves businesses worldwide with tools for payment processing, fraud prevention, and data analytics.

psps.name: GMO Payment Gateway
psps.summary: GMO Payment Gateway is a payment service provider in Japan, offering a various solutions for online and in-store transactions. It supports credit cards, e-wallets, and various alternative payment methods, with a focus on security, fraud prevention, and payment processing for businesses of all sizes.

psps.name: KG Inicis
psps.summary: KG Inicis is a South Korean payment gateway offering solutions for online and mobile payments. It supports various payment methods, including credit cards, e-wallets, and bank transfers, with a focus on secure transactions.

psps.name: KSNET
psps.summary: KSNET is a prominent South Korean payment service provider offering VAN (Value-Added Network) services and payment gateway solutions. Established in 1994, it supports credit card processing, bank transfers, and alternative payment methods for online and in-store transactions.

psps.name: Linkly
psps.summary: Linkly, formerly known as PC-EFTPOS, is an Australian-based payment solutions provider focused on , integrated point-of-sale (POS) systems. Linkly offers EFTPOS services, supporting thousands of businesses with payment processing and in-depth reporting tools to streamline transaction management.

psps.name: Maya
psps.summary: Maya is a Philippine-based digital payment platform offering payment processing solutions for online and offline businesses. It supports various payment methods, including credit cards, debit cards, and e-wallets, with a focus on transactions for the Southeast Asian market.

psps.name: MercadoPago
psps.summary: MercadoPago is a payment platform in Latin America, offering a range of payment solutions including credit and debit cards, bank transfers, and cash-based payments. It operates in countries like Argentina, Brazil, and Mexico.

psps.name: Mollie
psps.summary: Mollie is a European payment service provider offering businesses a way to accept online payments. It supports a various payment methods, including credit cards, PayPal, and local options like iDEAL and SEPA, making it across Europe.

psps.name: NHN KCP
psps.summary: KCP is a prominent payment gateway in South Korea, offering payment processing solutions for businesses across various industries. It supports multiple payment methods, including credit cards, bank transfers, and alternative payment channels, with a strong focus on security and integration.

psps.name: NICE Payments
psps.summary: NICE Payments provides payment gateway services in South Korea, supporting credit card processing, virtual accounts, and alternative payment methods for online transactions.

psps.name: NMI
psps.summary: NMI (Network Merchants Inc) is a payment gateway provider offering a platform for in-person, online, and mobile transactions. NMI specializes in omnichannel payment solutions, enabling businesses to streamline their payment processing with a focus on security and scalability across multiple sales channels.

psps.name: Nuvei
psps.summary: Nuvei is a payments technology company providing payment processing solutions for businesses of all sizes. Supporting credit cards, alternative payment methods, and cryptocurrency transactions, Nuvei's platform is designed for flexibility, scalability, and  integrations across multiple sectors.

psps.name: Opn Payments
psps.summary: Opn Payments, formerly known as Omise, is a payments platform in Asia, offering a suite of payment solutions. It supports online payments, recurring billing, and multi-currency transactions, catering to businesses of all sizes, with a focus on providing solutions.

psps.name: PayGent
psps.summary: PayGent is a Japanese payment service provider that specializes in offering payment solutions for e-commerce. It supports multiple payment methods, including credit cards, and provides fraud prevention and transaction management features.

psps.name: Payletter
psps.summary: Payletter specializes in payment solutions for digital content and online services, offering recurring billing, in-app purchases, and support for international payments.

psps.name: Payoneer
psps.summary: Payoneer offers cross-border payment solutions for freelancers, marketplaces, and large enterprises. It supports multi-currency transactions and allows businesses to send and receive funds. The platform includes services like billing, transfers, and integrated payment solutions.

psps.name: Paysafe
psps.summary: Paysafe is a leading specialized payments platform that provides online payment processing, digital wallet solutions, and card issuing services. It supports a wide range of payment methods and offers fraud management and recurring billing solutions for businesses globally.

psps.name: PayU
psps.summary: PayU is a payment service provider operating in multiple markets, with a focus on emerging economies. It offers a variety of payment solutions including credit and debit cards, as well as alternative payment methods. PayU enables businesses to accept localized payments, providing solutions for e-commerce and mobile platforms.

psps.name: Plastiq
psps.summary: Plastiq is a payment platform and gateway that enables businesses to pay vendors and accept payments using credit cards, even if cards are not traditionally accepted. It provides a versatile solution for cash flow management, invoice payments, and global payment processing.

psps.name: Rapyd
psps.summary: Rapyd is a Fintech-as-a-Service platform offering payment solutions, including online payments, digital wallets, and remittance services. It supports various payment methods across multiple markets, enabling businesses to accept local and cross-border payments with ease.

psps.name: Razorpay
psps.summary: Razorpay is an Indian payment gateway offering a suite of solutions for businesses to accept online payments. It supports multiple payment methods such as credit/debit cards, UPI, and wallets, making it a choice for Indian e-commerce merchants.

psps.name: Red Dot Payment
psps.summary: Red Dot Payment, a member of PayU, is an online payment gateway in Southeast Asia, offering customized payment solutions for businesses across sectors like retail, hospitality, and airlines. With fraud detection, multi-currency support, and integration, Red Dot Payment provides businesses with tools to manage online transactions effectively.

psps.name: SB Payment Service
psps.summary: SB Payment Service, a part of SoftBank Group, provides a payment solution for Japan-based businesses. The platform supports credit card processing, convenience store payments, carrier billing, and electronic money, offering both online and in-store payment options with a strong focus on security and integration.

psps.name: Shift4
psps.summary: Shift4 is a payment processing company offering end-to-end solutions for businesses of all sizes. It provides payment technologies, including integrated POS systems, e-commerce solutions, and fraud prevention tools, catering to various industries like hospitality, retail, and food services.

psps.name: Sony Payment Services
psps.summary: Sony Payment Services offers a payment processing solution designed for businesses. It provides a range of payment methods, including credit cards, e-wallets, and mobile payments, with a focus on integration and significant security.

psps.name: Square
psps.summary: Square is a payment processing platform for businesses, offering easy-to-use solutions for in-person, online, and mobile payments. Known for its Square Reader, the platform also provides tools for inventory management, invoicing, and e-commerce integration.

psps.name: Stripe
psps.summary: Stripe is a payments infrastructure provider that powers online transactions for internet businesses. With a focus on developer-friendly APIs, Stripe supports multiple currencies and offers tools for subscription management, invoicing, and fraud prevention.

psps.name: SumUp
psps.summary: SumUp is a global fintech company offering payment solutions such as card readers, POS systems, and online payment services, enabling businesses to accept payments seamlessly across various channels.

psps.name: Trust Payments
psps.summary: Trust Payments is a payment service provider offering a platform for online, in-store, and omnichannel payments. It caters to various industries with features like fraud prevention, recurring billing, and multi-currency processing, aimed at supporting the customer payment experience.

psps.name: Tyro
psps.summary: Tyro is an Australian fintech company specializing in EFTPOS (electronic funds transfer at point of sale) solutions for small and medium-sized businesses. It caters primarily to the healthcare, retail, and hospitality industries, providing , integrated payment solutions with competitive rates. Tyro also offers banking services, including business loans and term deposits.

psps.name: WePay
psps.summary: WePay, a Chase company, provides integrated payment solutions for platforms and marketplaces. It offers payments, fraud protection, and risk management with the ability to integrate payments into partner platforms.

psps.name: Windcave
psps.summary: Windcave is a payment solutions provider offering payment processing for both online and in-store transactions. With a focus on security and reliability, Windcave serves businesses in various industries with customizable payment solutions.

psps.name: Worldline
psps.summary: Worldline is a leader in payment services, providing businesses with , payment solutions. It offers a various services, from payment terminals to e-commerce processing, intended to optimize transactions and improve customer experience.

psps.name: Worldpay
psps.summary: Worldpay, part of FIS, is a payment processing company that provides solutions for online, in-store, and mobile transactions. It supports a various payment methods, offering security features and fraud management tools for businesses.

psps.name: Xendit
psps.summary: Xendit is a payment gateway in Southeast Asia, offering a range of digital payment solutions for businesses. It supports various payment methods including credit cards, e-wallets, direct bank transfers, and online invoicing, aiming to simplify payment processes across Indonesia, the Philippines, and beyond.

psps.name: Zai
psps.summary: Zai, formerly known as Assembly Payments, is an Australian-based fintech company providing automated, real-time payment solutions for large-scale businesses. Specializing in complex financial flows, Zai leverages the New Payments Platform (NPP) for fast,  account-to-account payments. It supports industries like marketplaces, banking, and lending, supporting financial operations with tailored API-driven solutions.

psps.name: Paysera
psps.summary: Paysera is a European-based payment gateway offering international money transfers, online payment processing, and prepaid cards. It provides businesses with affordable payment solutions, focusing on cross-border transactions.

psps.name: Mastercard Gateway (MPGS)
psps.summary: Mastercard Payment Gateway Services (MPGS) offers businesses a platform for accepting online payments with reach. It supports multiple payment methods, including credit cards and digital wallets, providing fraud detection and security features for merchants.

psps.name: Shopify Payments
psps.summary: Shopify Payments is an integrated payment processing solution for Shopify store owners. It allows businesses to accept payments directly through their Shopify platform, supporting major credit cards and offering checkout experiences for customers.
psps.notice: Shopify's payment page can be configured to submit payments via other PSPs. As such, it is possible that Shopify is misidentified as the PSP (and another PSP is used for card processing).

psps.name: Alipay
psps.summary: Alipay is a mobile and online payment platform in China, operated by Ant Group. It offers a range of financial services including payment processing, money transfers, and investment options, catering primarily to consumers and businesses looking for digital transactions.

psps.name: PayPal
psps.summary: PayPal is an online payment platform that allows individuals and businesses to make payments, transfer money, and complete online transactions. It supports a variety of payment methods, including credit cards, bank transfers, and PayPal account balances, making it a versatile choice for e-commerce and personal transactions.

psps.name: Braintree
psps.summary: Braintree, a PayPal service, offers a full-stack payment platform intended to make online payments for merchants. Its services include credit card processing, PayPal, Apple Pay, and subscription billing, with a focus on providing solutions for businesses.
psps.notice: Because PayPal and Braintree are integrated, sometimes Braintree is misidentified as the PSP (even though a separate PSP may be used for card processing).

psps.name: Gr4vy
psps.summary: Gr4vy is a cloud-native payment orchestration platform offering businesses the ability to deploy their payment infrastructure on the cloud. It simplifies the integration and management of multiple payment methods and gateways, providing features like tokenization, routing, and failover.
psps.notice: As an orchestration/proxy platform, Gr4vy obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.

psps.name: IXOPAY
psps.summary: IXOPAY is a payment orchestration platform providing centralized payment management, dynamic routing, and tokenization. It supports global payment methods and offers fraud prevention tools, making it a comprehensive solution for large enterprises.
psps.notice: As an orchestration/proxy platform, IXOPAY obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.

psps.name: PCI Proxy
psps.summary: PCI Proxy is a tokenization and proxy platform that enables businesses to securely handle sensitive payment data. It provides PCI compliance, tokenization, and flexible APIs for easy integration into payment systems.
psps.notice: As an orchestration/proxy platform, PCI Proxy obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.

psps.name: PCI Vault
psps.summary: PCI Vault offers secure tokenization services for storing and managing sensitive payment data. It focuses on compliance with PCI standards and provides robust APIs for seamless integration with eCommerce platforms.
psps.notice: As an orchestration/proxy platform, PCI Vault obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.

psps.name: Spreedly
psps.summary: Spreedly is a payment orchestration platform allowing businesses to securely tokenize, store, and optimize payment data. It supports connections to multiple gateways and payment services, enabling greater flexibility and scalability.
psps.notice: As an orchestration/proxy platform, Spreedly obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.

psps.name: VGS (Very Good Security)
psps.summary: Very Good Security (VGS) is a data security and tokenization platform that simplifies PCI compliance by replacing sensitive data with tokens. It offers seamless integration with payment systems while maintaining privacy and security.
psps.notice: As an orchestration/proxy platform, VGS obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.

psps.name: Amadeus Hospitality (TravelClick)
psps.summary: Amadeus Hospitality (TravelClick) enables hotels to validate credit cards and capture deposit payments for bookings. It integrates with third-party Payment Service Providers to facilitate secure and efficient payment management.
psps.notice: As a third party service provider (TSP), Amadeus Hospitality obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.

psps.name: Sabre SynXis
psps.summary: Sabre SynXis provides secure handling of payments for hotels, enabling seamless transactions across booking channels. It supports credit card validation, tokenization, and integration with multiple payment service providers to streamline the payment process and enhance guest experiences.
psps.notice: As a third party service provider (TSP), Amadeus Hospitality obscures the underlying PSP processing the payment. It is not possible from the merchant's frontend to determine who is the underlying card processor.
